SectionBody.Text: The department shall establish by rule the following fees:

Subsection.Text: For the initial licensure of a tattoo establishment and the renewal of such license, a fee not to exceed $250 per year.
For licensure of a temporary establishment, a fee not to exceed $250.
For the initial licensure of a tattoo artist and the renewal of such license, a fee not to exceed $150 per year.
For registration or reregistration of a guest tattoo artist, a fee not to exceed $45.
For reactivation of an inactive tattoo establishment license or tattoo artist license. A license becomes inactive if it is not renewed before the expiration of the current license.
